== Education Resources ==

Educating people about the <nowiki>[[http://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.html|free software philosophy]]</nowiki> and empowering them to <nowiki>[[http://www.fsf.org/resources/materials|advocate]]</nowiki> it to others. Gather and organize information and materials for advocating open source to these groups. 

* Educators
* Students
* Families
* Content Creators
** Musicians
** Video Producers
* Non-Profits
* Scientists
* Small office, home office
* Techies
